mapper.select: select distinct pdoc.id_peticion_documento ,pdoc.i_numero ,pdoc.s_tipo ,pdoc.id_facturar from sstt_despacho_interno_detalles did inner join sstt_peticion_detalles pd on pd.id_ot = did.id_ot inner join sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot on ot.id_ot = pd.id_ot inner join sstt_peticion_documentos pdoc on pdoc.id_peticion_documento = pd.id_peticion_documento where did.id_despacho_interno = #{idDespacho} and ot.id_estado = #{idEstado}

select count (distinct pdoc.id_peticion_documento) from sstt_despacho_interno_detalles did inner join sstt_peticion_detalles pd on pd.id_ot = did.id_ot inner join sstt_ordenes_trabajo ot on ot.id_ot = pd.id_ot inner join sstt_peticion_documentos pdoc on pdoc.id_peticion_documento = pd.id_peticion_documento where did.id_despacho_interno = #{idDespacho} and ot.id_estado = #{idEstado}
